data.description: Developed a real estate mobile app using Flutter, integrating APIs, Google Maps, and Firebase (Notification, Crashlytics, Analytics). Designed responsive UI from Figma, supporting multilingual localization. Applied clean architecture and Bloc for scalable, maintainable code. Managed tasks with Jira and collaborated via Slack for efficient remote work.

Enhanced user, delivery, and vendor apps using Flutter, improving responsiveness with real-time data streams. Developed a new vendor app from scratch, applying MVVM architecture with Provider. Integrated Branch.io for deep linking and Sentry for error tracking. Conducted testing and bug fixes to ensure app reliability.

Developed many mobile applications using Flutter for AI and blockchain use cases, integrating Google Cloud APIs (Big Query, Gmail API, Calendar API) and GPT Assistants API for advanced functionality. Implemented automation testing with Selenium and TestNG in Java, improving testing efficiency. Collaborated with backend, ML, DevOps, and design teams to deliver features on time. Wrote technical documentation in Markdown to streamline onboarding. Managed tasks using ClickUp and Notion for efficient project tracking.

Fixed 50+ critical bugs and refactored 50% of the codebase, improving app performance. Collaborated with backend team to integrate APIs for seamless data flow. Implemented new UI/UX designs to enhance user engagement. Ensured code quality through rigorous testing and debugging.

Developed mobile applications for educational and health sectors. Integrated Paymob payment gateway for secure in-app transactions. Fixed bugs related to in-app purchases and Apple Push Notification Service. Collaborated with clients to deliver tailored solutions, meeting specific requirements.

Gained hands-on experience in Flutter, focusing on state management, API integration, and local storage. Assisted in developing mobile applications, enhancing skills in Dart and app architecture. Contributed to team projects, learning agile workflows and version control with Git.

Developed solutions using C/C++, Java, and Python, focusing on data structures and algorithms. Optimized code for computational efficiency in algorithmic challenges. Collaborated with senior engineers to apply data handling techniques in real-world projects.
